docs.snippet: As the Nets have surged to a 7-1 record since the start of 2014, this has been the blueprint that Coach Jason Kidd has followed: Get the ball into Joe Johnson’s hands and let him get to work....
docs.lead_paragraph: As the Nets have surged to a 7-1 record since the start of 2014, this has been the blueprint that Coach Jason Kidd has followed: Get the ball into Joe Johnson’s hands and let him get to work.
